title: GeoNames REST API
descriptionLong: Geonames is a geographical database with web services that let users extract useful information about different places, such as weather, timezone and post codes. The GeoNames geographical database covers all countries and contains over eight million placenames that are available for download free of charge. Users can edit, correct and add new names using a wiki interface.

title: Food REST API v1.0
descriptionLong: The Food and Recipe API is spoonacular's Food, Recipe, Menu, Restaurant and Nutrition API which allows users to access over 360,000 recipes and 80,000 food products.

title: AirLabs REST API v7.0
descriptionShort: Codes for airports, airlines, cities, and aircrafts.
descriptionLong: AirLabs API provides codes for airports, airlines, cities, and aircrafts. Also, it provides information about countries, routes, and timezones. This data can be used for SEO purposes or to improve the functionality of search and meta-search services. Paid users receive real-time flight statistics as well as access to the fr, de, es, it, ru, th, tr languages. This REST API uses API Keys for authentication and provides data in JSON, JSONP, XML, and CSV.

title: Gisgraphy REST API v1.0
descriptionShort: Enables users to retrieve geocoordinates, street tracking, reverse geocoding, place search, nearby places.
descriptionLong: Gisgraphy API enables users to retrieve geocoordinates, street tracking, reverse geocoding, place search, nearby places and more. Since 2006, Gisgraphy has been an open-source framework that offers localization and geocoding via Java APIs or REST web services. Other features include importers for OpenStreetMap, Openaddresses, Geonames and Quattroshapes data, worldwide geocoding / worldwide reverse geocoding / and street search Web services, and fields for routing and vehicle tracking: lanes, toll, azimuth, surface, max speed, length, and oneway.

title: Divesites REST API
descriptionShort: Database information for scuba divers including location, weather, latitude & longitude, map, and tide stations.
descriptionLong: The Divesites API returns database information for scuba divers including location, weather, latitude & longitude, map, and tide stations. The API supports POST and GET methods, JSON and AJAX formats. Divesites API determines the location using Geo IP location and return sites in a radius from that point.

title: OneCodex REST API v1
descriptionShort: Microbiome analysis data to be used in applications to prevent disease.
descriptionLong: The OneCodex API retrieves microbiome analysis data to be used in applications to prevent disease. With it, developers can access lab samples, access metadata, retrieve analysis, classify results, and download documents. The API supports JSON format and can be authenticated with API Key. OneCodex is HIPAA-compliant platform for microbiome analysis.

title: Open Pinball Database REST API
descriptionShort: Provides searchable data about pinball machines and an API to add pinball machine data into applications.
descriptionLong: The Open Pinball Database provides searchable data about pinball machines and an API to add pinball machine data into applications. All OPDB data results are JSON formatted and available via REST API for querying data about specific machines, retrieving exports of the entire dataset, using specialized endpoints for typeahead searching and more. This service requires authentication using an Account ID and Token for most API endpoints with the exception of typeahead searching.

title: CORD-19 REST API v1
descriptionShort: Search of the COVID-19 Open Research Dataset (CORD-19), running in the Vespa Cloud.
descriptionLong: The CORD-19 Search and Navigate API is a Vespa.ai powered search of the COVID-19 Open Research Dataset (CORD-19), running in the Vespa Cloud. Vespa is an open big data serving engine, a part of the Yahoo Developer Network.

title: Request Kittens REST API
descriptionShort: Request Kittens provides a way to return various cat images.
descriptionLong: Request Kittens provides a way to return various cat images. Use the API to fetch information about a specific cat, get a randomized set of category-specific cat images, return images of cats based on an emotion (ie: grumpy) and more.

title: RAWG Video Games Database REST API
descriptionShort: The RAWG Video Games Database API enables access to data about video games.
descriptionLong: The RAWG Video Games Database API enables access to data about video games.

title: WormBase ParaSite REST API
descriptionShort: Provides language-neutral programmatic access to ParaSite data, parasitic worm draft genomes and genomic data in WormBase.
descriptionLong: The WormBase ParaSite REST API provides language-neutral programmatic access to ParaSite data, parasitic worm draft genomes and genomic data in WormBase. This includes nematode and flatworm genomes in WormBase ParaSite that represents 90 species. WormBase ParaSite is an open-access resource to analyse, store and present helminth genomic data, that is developed by EMBL-EBI and the Wellcome Trust Sanger Institute.

title: BrAPI Breeding REST API
descriptionShort: Provides access to a plant database with plant phenotype and genotype data.
descriptionLong: The BrAPI Breeding API provides access to a plant database with plant phenotype and genotype data. The API returns information associated with crops, germplasm, attributes, programs, locations, and genome maps. This information is available in JSON format. All calls need to be HTTPS authenticated. Note: The Breeding API specifies a standard interface for plant phenotype/genotype databases to serve their data to crop breeding applications. It is a shared, open API, to be used by all data providers and data consumers who wish to participate.

title: BrAPI Breeding REST API
descriptionShort: Provides access to a plant database with plant phenotype and genotype data.
descriptionLong: The BrAPI Breeding API provides access to a plant database with plant phenotype and genotype data. The API returns information associated with crops, germplasm, attributes, programs, locations, and genome maps. This information is available in JSON format. All calls need to be HTTPS authenticated. Note: The Breeding API specifies a standard interface for plant phenotype/genotype databases to serve their data to crop breeding applications. It is a shared, open API, to be used by all data providers and data consumers who wish to participate.
